Categorize this IT Ticket:

new certificate for thursday july pm fwd users issues hi please error connect issue cert per recommendation regards begin forwarded re users issues date july cert senior engineer ext cell upcoming days off phone number date thursday july re users issues hi help error please verify error depth error self signed certificate certificate error routines certificate certificate verify failed error bio error error object error error failed fatal error errors restarting soft error received process restarting reconnecting error hold release warning certificate verification method has more update required work around regards wrote users issue right want provide work around issues temp profile install instructions user affect import profile please follow steps unzip attached archive double extracted temp file os prompt input launch choose temp profile profile ask please quotes please let help setting profile more than glad help sorry inconvenience great ahead please issues thanks senior engineer ext upcoming days off february february
